result.text:
Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's last day in office will be January 5, 2026, over a month away. One potential reason she is hanging on for a bit longer, enduring the president’s ire and the possible threats to personal safety that sometimes follow: It ensures that she will be in office for more than five years, locking in a bare minimum congressional pension. 

Full story: https://t.co/99Gdsc1c0v
📸: Julia Demaree Nikhinson via Associated Press
